extension.news: - Home: Try ensuring HomeWindow properly closes when exit/quit was requested - Player: Increase leeway for waiting for correct audio track from 2s to 4s - SeekDialog: Increase leeway for waiting for correct subtitle track from 2s to 4s - VideoPlayer/KodiGUI/CoreELEC: Try deferring the init procedure by 0.25s to hopefully avoid control initialization issues - Episodes/Shows/Movies: Make "go to section" action actually visit the section instead of the home hub - Episodes: When returning from "Go To Show" or "Go To SECTION", don't use reselect logic - Library: Use library title in title header instead of library type - Remove all obsolete dividers in sub views
